Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for data storage, processing, and analytics. Identify the use cases, data sources, and expected outcomes for the Azure Synapse Analytics implementation.
Design the database architecture, including schema design, data distribution strategies, and integration with existing systems.
Create and configure an Azure Synapse Analytics workspace in the Azure portal. Ensure proper resource allocation and region selection.
Implement security measures such as firewall rules, private endpoints, and role-based access control (RBAC) to secure the Synapse workspace.
Set up data integration pipelines to ingest data from various sources into the Synapse workspace. Use Azure Data Factory or other ETL tools as needed.
Implement performance optimization techniques such as indexing, partitioning, and caching to ensure efficient query execution.
Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit. Configure Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) and SSL/TLS for secure connections.
Perform thorough testing of the database functionality, including data ingestion, query execution, and analytics workflows.
Configure monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Synapse Analytics built-in tools to track database performance and health.
Create detailed documentation for the database setup, configurations, and operational procedures. Share this with the relevant teams.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Azure Synapse Analytics database setup.
Ensure the database setup adheres to regulatory compliance requirements. Conduct regular audits to verify compliance and security postures.
